title: Power calculator global configuration
description:
Global settings file for the power calculator application.
Schema on github: https://github.com/Engineer2B/PowerCalculator-Schemas

RelativePath.title: Relative folder path
RelativePath.description: The relative path to the folder, e.g. for the folder 'xyz' in d:\data\xyz the value would be 'xyz'

DataFolderPath.title: Data folder path
DataFolderPath.description: The root folder of the data folder from which all relative paths are calculated.

Output.title: Output folder path
Output.description: The path to the output folder

Log.title: Log folder path
Log.description: The path to the folder where errors and such are logged to.

allOf.title: Transducer folder path
allOf.description: The path to the folder where the transducer positions are stored.

FileName.title: File name
FileName.description: The name of the transducer position file.

FileName.title: File name
FileName.description: The name of the preset file.

FileName.title: File name
FileName.description: The name of the mesh file.
